Our clients have been loving our Bloom Pro plans which launched last month, but I wanted to offer something truly budget minded without compromising on performance. That's where Bloom Basic comes in! See below for details on our entry-level plan:

**Bloom Basic - 3GB Plan**

* Core i9 10900X - 1 Shared Logical Core
* 3 GB Dedicated DDR4 RAM
* 60 GB NVMe SSD Storage
* 2 TB Transfer 1 Gbps port
* U.S. Servers Ogden, UT
* 1 IPv4
* KVM Virtualization

**To order visit us at https://bloomvps.com**
